TrustCore_init(uint8,address,address,byt.details: Trust name, governing law, and purpose stored off-chain in DB for privacy

params.isRevocable: Whether the trust can be revoked
params.trustInstrumentHash: Hash of the trust document (privacy-preserving link)

getTrustInfo().details: Trust name and governing law stored off-chain in DB for privacy

packedSelectors().details: Each selector is 4 bytes, packed sequentially with no padding      MUST NOT include packedSelectors() itself in the returned selectors      MUST be a pure function (no state access)

addBeneficiary(address,uint256,string).notice: Add a beneficiary to the trust

getSuccessorTrustees().notice: Get all successor trustees in order

isBeneficiary(address).notice: Check if address is a beneficiary

isTrustee(address).notice: Check if address is a trustee

packedSelectors().notice: Returns all function selectors for this facet as tightly packed bytes

removeBeneficiary(address).notice: Remove a beneficiary from the trust

revokeTrust().notice: Revoke the trust (only for revocable trusts, only by grantor)
